website_summaries.verdict: The best feature of this commercial size tool chest is its versatility. Suitable for mechanics, hairstylists, repairmen, and more. Matching toolbox available for upgrade.
pros: Solid steel construction with a secure lock
Castor wheels move smoothly under load
Drawer space is ample and drawers slide easily
cons: Some reports of damage upon arrival
Drawers may be shallower than expected

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for use as salon rollabouts. They are AMAZING!! Worth the cost and since meant for tools nothing we put in them will ever be as heavy as to hurt wheels. All metal means no staining and easily wipes clean and looks great! Would totally buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s just like described arrived a day early, no damage. Very pleased. I’m a hair dresser and this thing
customer_reviews.author: Coral W

customer_reviews.title: Favorite piece of furniture in my salon!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite piece of furniture in my salon! Well worth the price! Everything about this is perfect, with the exception of one thing. I wish that the bottom shelf/cubby's door swung open or slid back...something as it's a little bit of a pain to open and reach in to such a great space. I love the mats that are included. I love the color that I chose. Truly...I LOVE this and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: golfprosprincess

customer_reviews.title: This ranks in my top 3 Amazon purchases!  Love it  !!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine what I did before this toolbox!! We had a few things "grow legs" so I ordered this locking toolbox, and PINK matches our grooming salon décor! This very roomy compact toolbox is awesome and it holds everything I need!! BONUS IT LOCKS AND IT VERY STURDY!! Now on the surveillance tape, we will definitely know who's got sticky fingers because they have to take the whole damn box!
customer_reviews.author: dawgpaula

customer_reviews.title: Boxes are big and heavy. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cart for my cosmetic tattooing business I am building! Steel tool carts are commonly used in tattooing shops but I did not want to commit to red and black would have taken away from the elegance look I am trying to create. White was perfect! I also love that they lock so each technician can have their own and lock up their stuff and wheel it to the storage room when they are done working so I don’t have to deal with anyone complaining someone else touched their stuff. Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Clarice MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months. I love it. I had no problem with delivery or assembly. The wheels roll great. The storage is sufficient. I am a busy stylist, this station hold all my brushes, combs, tools, and products. I would say i would buy it again, but it seems so sturdy, i doubt i will need to buy another one for years!!!! I did purchase the attachable tool holder for the side.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ty

customer_reviews.title: Female Automotive Techs Dream
customer_reviews.text: My box is used every day at work in an automotive shop. So far, so Good on quality. Easy to roll, the only drawback is the top drawer won't stay closed unless it is locked.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quicking, excellent packaging, not a scratch or dent.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in the hair salon as my Wife's workstation. Been in use for 6 months and no issues. Arrived quicking, excellent packaging, not a scratch or dent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - Vista, CA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged when I received it and it is to narrow for the pink toolbox I purchased with it. The top drawer will not stay shut and the key is missing. Do not purchase. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Rolls nicely and drawers open and close with ease. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Functional and pretty. The locking mechanism and drawer tracks are not as smooth as the ones I purchased from a different Viper Box retailer. Makes me think they are replicas, but they look great and mix in well with my others.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in mint condition
customer_reviews.text: Love my viper cart! Arrived in mint condition and was super easy to install the wheels. Drawers glide nice and smooth but need a little push to close all the way when locking up at the end of the day. I can practically glide and swivel this cart with my pinky! Definitely 5 Star worthy.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeQueenT

customer_reviews.title: This tool chest is the best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: I am a nail technician. This tool chest was a Christmas gift from my husband. Just the right size. Really like the bigger space at the bottom for storing taller lotion bottles and disinfectants. Very sturdy and great bright lime green color!
customer_reviews.author: PedicureSnob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for work, it was perfect for my salon work space. I ordered 5 more and wired them all for power. They work great for stylist stations.
customer_reviews.author: CFazz

customer_reviews.title: The tool chest is beautiful, but it arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The tool chest is beautiful, but it arrived damaged. The bottom of the box was completely open, with only clear packing tape holding the chest in. Bottom was badly dented.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: one of the most functional and beautiful toolboxes you'll find
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, well built, one of the most functional and beautiful toolboxes you'll find! The drawers open and close smoothly, and the color is out of this world! Top quality, it makes storing your tools feel downright decadent! I have another Viper toolbox and not only do they make my studio look awesome, they just feel and work like the highest quality furniture you can find!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my salon
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my salon as my station. And it’s so perfect. It’s bigger than you think and has plenty of room on the top to put my extra towels and a towel down to put my scissors clippers trimmer water bottle with color bowls and foil! It’s PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dye

customer_reviews.title: Okay but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay quality tool chest for a compact space. Not many that are 16" wide. However, mine arrived badly banged up. Lock didn't work and bottom shelf door wouldn't hold open.
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TOOLBOX TROLLEY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TOOLBOX TROLLEY! I use it for my cosmetology supplies and its the greatest thing ever! cleans up so easy, holds everything I need and is so spacious. great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Randie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Lime!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my family practice clinic in the exam rooms. we can wheel the cart into the storage room and restock much easier than carrying supplies back and forth. I wish it rolled better on low pile carpet and also wish it came with handles on both sides. It only comes with one handle so you have to choose which side of the cart your prefer it to be attached. Easy to assemble. Looks bigger in the picture. It is very narrow but suits the purpose i need it for.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I would like it IF I could actually get one that wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like it IF I could actually get one that wasn't damaged!! I've received 2 so far, both badly damaged and had to be returned. not sure if I want to take another chance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! The wheels are a little hard to work and the bottom came Bent. Luckily the bottom was easy to bend back with a pair of vice grips. Overall the construction is rock solid and the drawers are buttery smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After I purchased this item, I realized that it is the same pink box used by the contestants in the RuPaul's Drag Race show. I absolutely love mine! Now all my tools are organized.
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what this even looks like. The box was so damaged I didn’t even open it! It looks like It came from a war zone.
customer_reviews.author: Mickmae

customer_reviews.title: No key and drawers are locked but the bottom one
customer_reviews.text: No key and drawers are locked but the bottom one. No power strip or wheels. I like the tool box but I’d like it better if I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Looooove
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! I use it for my tattoo cart- wish i could afford a few more for my home art supplies :)
customer_reviews.author: Savannah J

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Like it Wish drawer was lil deeper For the price I paid I honestly don’t think it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Cynn

customer_reviews.title: used product
customer_reviews.text: Product was not new. There was hair all stuck in the wheels and there is a huge dent in the bottom where the corner is now rusting. Also scratches all throughout the bottom paint.
customer_reviews.author: kimchar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool storage unit !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tool storage unit and have been nothing but thoroughly impressed with its build quality and how great it looks. Don't be fooled by the narrow width because the drawers are nice and deep. It also comes with some great little touches like matching precut drawer liners and two keys in the same color. I've been using this tool storage unit at work and It is everything I hoped and then some. The other great thing about this unit is that if you run out of space they sell a tool box that matches up to this unit perfectly and sits on top of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding purchase! Incredibly functional, gorgeous color and perfect for my salon. Without even using it yet, I locked it and lost the keys! The company was awesome to work with and got me a replacement set of keys ASAP. Highly recommend The Original Pink Box!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This cart is sturdy and well built. A little challenging to get the wheels on, due to my not owning many tools! I’m a teacher and use it in my classroom for lockable storage.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: good quality. easy to assemble - only had to ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality. easy to assemble - only had to put wheels and the handle on it. love the color and this should hold up to many many years of very heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: nice cabinet rolls nice is not top heavy, well built
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time without any damage. Very satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: BD46

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Have been useing this at work for 8 months so far to store my dog grooming equipment in and it is fantastic. If you have a ton of equipment get a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great liitle tool chest. After reading reviews, I was worried about shipping damage, but it arrived in perfect condition! It was a little tricky to get all the rollers and keys out of a locked drawer though! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Raynes

customer_reviews.title: Grandmother is crafting!
customer_reviews.text: This is the prettiest tool box....it arrived double boxed....only thing to assemble was the wheels.....works perfectly! Love it
customer_reviews.author: fraiser

customer_reviews.title: No key
customer_reviews.text: Like the design of tool box very sturdy but it came without the key to lock it Amazon offered to send it back but I declined
customer_reviews.author: sharron k. moats

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a really nice sturdy product. It held everything I wanted it to and is the BEST color.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me in my salon. Very good quality and lots of space. Also looks really nice and clean. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: sarah lingenbrink

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Drawers slide nicely and the entire chest is heavy and substantial. I love the additional tool storage rack that I bought for the side. This cart is a nice addition to my salon space!
customer_reviews.author: JoJoB

customer_reviews.title: Pink!
customer_reviews.text: My new tool box is awesome and better than I hoped for. It was packed so securely. I didn't know cardboard was made that thick. Thank you Calais for making sure it arrived safely!
customer_reviews.author: APRIL CARTRETTE

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! So much storage and it looks awesome! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: mesha

customer_reviews.title: My very first Amazon review...it's that good!!
customer_reviews.text: I've made dozens of purchases on Amazon and I've never bothered to review anything until now. I LOVE this tool cart. I'm using it as a fabulous night stand!! The color is gorgeous! It holds all my medication and other things I don't want to leave out in plain sight, PLUS I can lock it up for safe keeping. I highly recommend it and it arrived exactly 7 days from the date I placed the order. WOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo H.

customer_reviews.title: Helped me get my workspace organized
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because it came dented but I tapped it out so it's hardley noticable. Other than that It is well made and the color is pretty. Just what I wanted and I plan to order mor Pink Box products.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Love this just what I wanted for all my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this just what I wanted for all my hair salon tools!! As far as shipping it does have a dent at the bottom almost sent it back but would have been more trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Hair Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, being used as a cart in my salon. I ordered 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C

customer_reviews.title: Supplement Larger Viper
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking plus functional drawer and cabinet space. Used in the house for DVD stand next to larger matching Viper TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Philley

customer_reviews.title: perfect for saloon
customer_reviews.text: Box is sturdy and nicely built. holds all my hair stuff yet still fits in my station. I cant wait to get other accessories for my station
customer_reviews.author: Lynelle Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Made Right and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Well built, handy drawer space. Good for use in the house in lieu of smelly press board cabinets and drawers.
customer_reviews.author: R. Philley

customer_reviews.title: So Good You'll want two
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my my camera supplies. Love the drawers. The thing is brilliant. Love the color so much that I keep it in my dining room. My wife doesn't mind either. So that's a good thing. The drawers are sturdy. The wheels work great. The big drawer at the bottom opens up from the bottom up just like a garage door. I can't complain about anything at all. I'd buy another one right now if I needed to. I probably will in the future for my garage. I got some tools that need sorting.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Guy

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for organizing our tools.The drawers work smoothly. The wheels of the castors hit the metal on bottom making it hard to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage device, but came broken, dented, and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The storage device itself is excellent. However, it came dented, bent, broken and missing some pieces. We had to return it. We did obtain a 2nd device, but not through Amazon, and we will of it. I would rate the Viper Tool Storage V1804WHR 16-Inch 4-Drawer cabinet as excellent. My wife uses it for cosmetics, makeup and all her makeup footprint. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Landsberg

customer_reviews.title: Solid Toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for what I need it for. Small enough to tuck away in a corner or big enough to work on if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Holmstrom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Well Built Storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool chest for my grooming van, leaving the wheels off for obvious reasons. This product arrived in excellent condition except only that one of the rubber attachments that "soft lock" the drawers upon closing (not the rear locking mechanism that operates using the key) had separated during shipping. I emailed the company, and I was immediatly emailed short instructions on how to resolve the problem. The chest is beautiful, rugged, and operates smoothly. Customer service is prompt and efficient. I highly recommend this Salon Cart for any grooming shop or mobile grooming van. This Viper Cart is totally professional looking, and I look forward to many years of trouble free service. Michael
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Tool Storage.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these in my salon. I LOVE them...
customer_reviews.author: jeanne b adwani

customer_reviews.title: Missing bolts! Dented!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with several major dents. All 16 bolts for the wheels are missing. Not sure if I'm supposed to get 1 handle or 2 but I only received 1 handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I anticipated. Plenty of room for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have a cart that's tough enough to stand ...
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have a cart that's tough enough to stand up to everything I do and has space for all my tools.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Paetzel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and design
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and well built. All the drawers roll out smoothly and lock into place firmly. The packaging was more then adequate to protect the drawer from dents. The design and dimensions of this drawer is perfect for storing small tools that are frequently used without taking too much floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've read complaints about shipping, luckily mine arrived quickly & in great condition. Lots of room. I wish the bottom had a pull out drawer, it's a little awkward to use as is. Love the purple color! It also came with drawer mats included. It moves around easily & holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's met all my expectations. It's made very well n will last many years
customer_reviews.author: Shereen Horton

customer_reviews.title: So good, I needed another!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of them with the power shelf for each. I now am going to purchase a second power shelf for each one to rest on the opposite side. Great! I love how useful it is for so many different items!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Ryan

customer_reviews.title: exterior volume is not very good. It's a joy to use but it sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Interier vs. exterior volume is not very good. It's a joy to use but it sure does take up unnecessary space.
customer_reviews.author: J Owens

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made to be so pricey
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my white viper tool box today & im not at all impressed!!! I absolutely have to have it today or I would’ve sent it back!! The side of it is dinged, half the wheels don’t work & my top drawer was shoved all the way back into my toolbox I had to get help pulling it out! Not to mention it was spray painted & the bottom of it wasn’t completely sprayed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality box but mine came damaged. Not to where it wouldn't work but damaged nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to maneuver. The drawers slide out easily. The bottom compartment is not a drawer, which was disappointing to me as it is hard to get yo anything stored there. I would not buy this chest again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. O'Day

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME CART SHIPPED FAST AND WAS IN A NICE SAFE BOX NO DENTS OR DAMAGE!
customer_reviews.author: phyllis howard

customer_reviews.title: Pretty deep purple
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged but replacing hopefully that goes smooth. Pretty deep purple
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about all of this
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and was missing pieces. when i tried to contact the manufacturer to get them, they wanted me to pay for them. Not happy about all of this trouble
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not nearly as useful or economical when ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but not nearly as useful or economical when details such as sending bolts and needed hardware is overlooked. :( aggravating to drive to lowes and spend $20 on bolts to secure wheels onto cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing key
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the key for the lock in my tool box. Makes this box 8 more useless
customer_reviews.author: LBurleigh

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This original pink tool box was damaged when I received it. Not happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: nicole aquinaldo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this storage unit is a mess with smashed side, wheels off
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: The worst shipping I've ever seen in my life.
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest much for the function of the cart because it came completely unusable. The box did not have the keys (nor wheels) to open the drawers.... the must have fallen out as the half-a-box was delivered on my doorstep. The box was open on every corner, leaving the green paint exposed and severely damaged and chipped. I'm attaching photos momentarily if possible. I'm returning it for severe superficial AND functional damage.
customer_reviews.author: Dash of Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Feedback on order
customer_reviews.text: Damaged on arrival , looks larger in photo , I would describe as a Mimi storage tool box , loved the color
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

product_meta.title: Viper Tool Storage V1804WHR 16-Inch 4-Drawer 18G Steel Rolling Tool/Salon Cart, with Bulk Storage, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThis slim and sturdy cart from Viper Tool Storage is appropriate anywhere, from the workplace to home. The durable powder coated finish resists wearing and corrosion, maintaining its color for years to come. Each drawer is load rated to hold up to 100 pounds. Smooth rolling ball bearing slides include hold-in detents that help keep the drawers from drifting open. Attractive full length drawer pulls are crafted from stain resistant 6000 series extruded aluminum. Matching pre-cut non-slip drawer liner is included to keep your valuables in place and cushioned as you use the drawers or transport your cart. The bulk compartment with a panel door conveniently stores oversized items. The round key barrel lock and internal locking bar secure all the drawers at their slides, keeping your valuables safe. Four 2-inch, low profile, locking, swivel casters and one chrome plated tubular side handle make this cart portable so you can keep your supplies close at hand. Complete your work station with our matching folding side shelf with power strip and removable aluminum storage cups, (model V1SWH sold separately). Backed by a manufacturer’s lifetime warranty against defects. Call manufacturer at 951-296-1359 for replacement parts.
feature_bullets: Powder coated to resist wear and corrosion
Each drawer supports up to 100 lbs and features quick release ball bearing slides, hold-in detents, stain resistant pulls, and matching non-slip liner
Internal keyed locking system deters prying and theft
Built to last from 18 gauge steel and backed by a lifetime warranty against defects

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
